snippet: Delta Air Lines says it is banning hoverboards — the motorized, two-wheel, skateboard-size scooters — because of the fire danger from the lithium-ion batteries that power the devices.
abstract: Delta Air Lines bans hoverboards from airplanes citing fire danger threat posed by lithium-ion batteries that power the devices.
lead_paragraph: Delta Air Lines says it is banning hoverboards — the motorized, two-wheel, skateboard-size scooters — because of the fire danger from the lithium-ion batteries that power the devices.

headline.print_headline: Delta Bans Hoverboards, Citing Batteries’ Safety Risk
